name: Phantom Assassin
title: Mortred
lore: Through a pact made with the Veiled Oracle, Mortred became the Phantom Assassin, an unstoppable contract killer.

stiflingDagger.name: Stifling Dagger
stiflingDagger.description: Throws a dagger that slows and deals attack-based damage to the target.

phantomStrike.name: Phantom Strike
phantomStrike.description: Teleports to a target and gains bonus attack speed for several attacks.

blur.name: Blur
blur.description: Gives PA a chance to evade attacks. Can activate to become invisible briefly.

coupDeGrace.name: Coup de Grace
coupDeGrace.description: PA refines her assassination technique, gaining a chance to deal devastating critical strikes.
